/usr/bin/c++   -g -Wall -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names   CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/app.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/core/geometry.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/core/material.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/core/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/hdr/hdrrawimage.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/objects/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/render/renderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hdr.dir/src/render/shader.cpp.o  -o hdr  -framework AGL -framework OpenGL /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -framework Cocoa -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation /usr/lib/libGLEW.dylib
